casebody.data:
Jack SHEARER, Appellant, v. F. G. ZERBST, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 8580. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 12, 1937. Jack Shearer, in pro. per. Lawrence S. Camp, U. S. Atty., and Harvey H. Tisinger, Asst. U. S. Attys., all of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before FOSTER, SIBLEY, and HOLMES, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
